account.description: Name of the account to which the Consumer belongs.

ackWait.description: How long to allow messages to remain un-acknowledged before attempting redelivery.

backoff.description: List of durations representing a retry time scale for NaK'd or retried messages.

creds.description: NATS user credentials for connecting to servers. Please make sure your controller has mounted the creds on its path.

deliverGroup.description: The name of a queue group.

deliverSubject.description: The subject to deliver observed messages, when not set, a pull-based Consumer is created.

filterSubject.description: Select only a specific incoming subjects, supports wildcards.

filterSubjects.description: List of incoming subjects, supports wildcards. Available since 2.10.

headersOnly.description: When set, only the headers of messages in the stream are delivered, and not the bodies. Additionally, Nats-Msg-Size header is added to indicate the size of the removed payload.

heartbeatInterval.description: The interval used to deliver idle heartbeats for push-based consumers, in Go's time.Duration format.

inactiveThreshold.description: The idle time an Ephemeral Consumer allows before it is removed.

jsDomain.description: The JetStream domain to use for the consumer.

maxAckPending.description: Maximum pending Acks before consumers are paused.

maxRequestBatch.description: The largest batch property that may be specified when doing a pull on a Pull Consumer.

maxRequestExpires.description: The maximum expires duration that may be set when doing a pull on a Pull Consumer.

maxRequestMaxBytes.description: The maximum max_bytes value that maybe set when dong a pull on a Pull Consumer.

maxWaiting.description: The number of pulls that can be outstanding on a pull consumer, pulls received after this is reached are ignored.

memStorage.description: Force the consumer state to be kept in memory rather than inherit the setting from the stream.

nkey.description: NATS user NKey for connecting to servers.

pauseUntil.description: RFC3339 timestamp until which the consumer should be paused.

pinnedTtl.description: TTL for pinned client when using pinned_client priority policy.

preventDelete.description: When true, the managed Consumer will not be deleted when the resource is deleted.

preventUpdate.description: When true, the managed Consumer will not be updated when the resource is updated.

priorityGroups.description: List of priority groups for the consumer. For now, only one group is supported.

priorityPolicy.description: Priority policy for consumer (pinned_client, overflow, prioritized, or none).

rateLimitBps.description: Rate at which messages will be delivered to clients, expressed in bit per second.

replicas.description: When set do not inherit the replica count from the stream but specifically set it to this amount.

sampleFreq.description: What percentage of acknowledgements should be samples for observability.

servers.description: A list of servers for creating consumer.

streamName.description: The name of the Stream to create the Consumer in.

tls.description: A client's TLS certs and keys.

clientCert.description: A client's cert filepath. Should be mounted.

clientKey.description: A client's key filepath. Should be mounted.

rootCas.description: A list of filepaths to CAs. Should be mounted.

tlsFirst.description: When true, the KV Store will initiate TLS before server INFO.
